column5: Hey guys, My brothers family and mine are leaving on Saturday for a one week trip to "Jack's Lake". It is apparently close to Trout Lake... we have not been there before. I am told the lake holds pike, pickereyes and bass, no Lunge. Just wondering if anyone has ever fished the lake and might have some "local tips". It's gonna be a family thing, so I have armed myself with tons of jigs, bobbers and nightcrawlers... however, my brother and I like to get for a "serious fish or two" during the week... I assuming weedlines, rock piles etc... Anyway, any help is certainly appreciated! Feel free to PM me should you wish. Thanks, HH
Pretty shure Lake X is right around there too might wanna give it a whirl -- fishn's always great there.
Pretty sure the X is still on the side of my brothers boat Raf... so we should be good for that spot. HH
Good luck HH!  Does your brother sing brown eyed girl too?
I'll be camping during Labor Day weekend, just a little north from Jack's, at Silent Lake PP. Let me know how the fishing goes for the area!
Only after a few cobs of corn!!! HH
Never fished it, probably should one of these days. Is your brother making pulled pork? Might be a reason to drag the boat up there this weekend.  Have a great vacation!!
FOGHAT RULES!!!  Deep cabbage weedlines... but I'm just guessing.
